benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods/refresh - Refresh account payment methods

covered: Valid PUT requests covered with multiple test cases (TC01-TC07) exercising required parameters, optional pluginName and pluginProperty, and multiple pluginProperty values.

Error handling and input validation covered: invalid accountId format (TC08), non-existent account (TC09), missing required header (TC10), unsupported pluginName (TC11), malformed pluginProperty (TC12).
External dependencies and integration errors covered: external gateway down (TC13), plugin service unavailable (TC25).
Error handling for timeouts and degraded performance covered: timeout (TC20), degraded system performance (TC29).
Security test coverage: SQL injection (TC16), XSS (TC17).
Edge cases: extra unexpected query parameters (TC18), very large accountId (TC19).
Authorization coverage: missing/invalid auth tested (TC10, TC15).
Data consistency covered: data consistency after refresh (TC26).
Performance and scalability tests included: performance - concurrent requests (TC23), large payloads in pluginProperty (TC24).
State variations: state when no accounts (TC27) and partially populated database (TC28).
Regression and backward compatibility tests: pluginProperty encoding (TC21), backward compatibility (TC22).
Accessibility: API docs and error messages (TC30).
Integration: Plugin service availability (TC25) and data consistency (TC26).
gaps: Concurrency/race condition testing: no explicit test for race conditions when multiple updates occur concurrently.
Rate limiting/throttling: no tests covering how the API handles bursts of requests.
Caching behavior: no tests for caching headers (ETag/Cache-Control) or related caching semantics.
Explicit 400/422 handling for repeated invalid requests or idempotence behaviors on repeated calls.
recommendations: Add a concurrency test simulating multiple simultaneous refresh requests on the same account to detect race conditions and ensure idempotence.
Add tests for rate limiting/throttling behavior under bursty traffic.
Add tests for caching headers and validation of ETag/Cache-Control if applicable to this endpoint.
Consider additional negative tests for repeated invalid requests and validate idempotence semantics on repeated refresh calls.
